paragraphs.text: The cover features artwork of Korra waterbending.

paragraphs.body: The Legend of Korra—Coloring Book (ISBN 1-5067-0246-5) is a coloring book published by ${link_0}, featuring forty-five highly-detailed, original black-and-white images to color made by artist Jed Henry. Based on the animated series ${link_1}, the book is produced in close collaboration with the creators of the series, ${link_2} and ${link_3}. The artwork is 10" x 10", and the book counts 96 pages. It was released on July 12, 2017 and available for purchase at the San Diego Comic Com on July 20, 2017.
paragraphs.text: The Legend of Korra—Coloring Book (ISBN 1-5067-0246-5) is a coloring book published by Dark Horse Comics, featuring forty-five highly-detailed, original black-and-white images to color made by artist Jed Henry. Based on the animated series The Legend of Korra, the book is produced in close collaboration with the creators of the series, Michael Dante DiMartino and Bryan Konietzko. The artwork is 10" x 10", and the book counts 96 pages. It was released on July 12, 2017 and available for purchase at the San Diego Comic Com on July 20, 2017.
